languages.text: "Будь благословен, собрат. Усердие твое и подобных тебе обращает хаос в порядок, дарует Знанию классификацию и рубрикацию". {n}Один из мехадендритов Паскаля легко касается тела лексмеханика, и тот, вздрогнув, почтительно кланяется.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Будь благословен, собрат. Усердие твое и подобных тебе обращает хаос в порядок, дарует Знанию классификацию и рубрикацию". {n}Один из механодендритов Паскаля легко касается тела лексмеханика, и тот, вздрогнув, почтительно кланяется.{/n}

languages.text: "Be blessed, tech-brother. Your diligence and the diligence of those like you turns anarchy into order, and bestows classification to Knowledge." {n}One of Pasqal's mechadendrites lightly touches the Lexmechanic's body. The Tech-Priest bows respectfully in return, clearly a little startled.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Будь благословен, собрат. Усердие твое и подобных тебе обращает хаос в порядок, дарует Знанию классификацию и рубрикацию". {n}Один из мехадендритов Паскаля легко касается тела лексмеханика, и тот, вздрогнув, почтительно кланяется.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Be blessed, tech-brother. The diligence of your and those like you turns anarchy into order, bestows classification and rubrication on Knowledge. {n}One of Pascal's mechadendrites lightly touches the lexmechanic's body. The Tech-Priest bows respectfully in return, clearly a little startled.{/n}

"Be blessed, tech-brother. Your diligence and the diligence of those like you turns anarchy into order, and bestows classification to Knowledge." {n}One of Pascal's mechadendrites lightly touches the lexmechanic's body. The Tech-Priest bows respectfully in return, clearly a little startled.{/n}

"Be blessed, tech-brother. Your diligence and the diligence of those like you turns anarchy into order, and bestows classification to Knowledge." {n}One of Pasqal's mechadendrites lightly touches the Lexmechanic's body. The Tech-Priest bows respectfully in return, clearly a little startled.{/n}

languages.text: 「同胞に加護のあらんことを。貴公の勤勉さ、そして貴公のような者の勤勉さが無秩序を秩序へ変換し、知恵に等級を与えるのだ」{n}パスカルの機械触手が1本法技術者の身体に優しく触れる。返報に技術司祭はうやうやしく頭を下げるが、明らかに少し驚いている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Be blessed, tech-brother. Your diligence and the diligence of those like you turns anarchy into order, and bestows classification to Knowledge." {n}One of Pasqal's mechadendrites lightly touches the Lexmechanic's body. The Tech-Priest bows respectfully in return, clearly a little startled.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「同胞に加護のあらんことを。貴公の勤勉さ、そして貴公のような者の勤勉さが無秩序を秩序へ変換し、知恵に等級を与えるのだ」{n}パスカルの機械触手が1本法技術者の身体に優しく触れる。返報に技術司祭はうやうやしく頭を下げるが、明らかに少し驚いている。{/n}

languages.text: “祝福你，技术兄弟。正是你的勤奋，还有其他那些像你一样勤奋的人，才在混乱中创造出了秩序，为知识进行分类。”{n}帕斯卡其中一个机械触须轻轻地触碰了文泽莱斯的身体。文泽莱斯恭敬地鞠躬回礼，显然有些惊愕。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Be blessed, tech-brother. Your diligence and the diligence of those like you turns anarchy into order, and bestows classification to Knowledge." {n}One of Pasqal's mechadendrites lightly touches the Lexmechanic's body. The Tech-Priest bows respectfully in return, clearly a little startled.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “祝福你，技术兄弟。正是你的勤奋，还有其他那些像你一样勤奋的人，才在混乱中创造出了秩序，为知识进行分类。”{n}帕斯卡其中一个机械触须轻轻地触碰了文泽莱斯的身体。文泽莱斯恭敬地鞠躬回礼，显然有些惊愕。{/n}

languages.text: «Bendito seas, tecnohermano. Tu diligencia y la de tus semejantes trocan la anarquía en orden, así como dotan de jerarquía al conocimiento». {n}Una de las mecadendritas de Pasqal roza el cuerpo del lexmecánico. A cambio, el tecnosacerdote, ligeramente sobresaltado, le dedica una reverencia.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Be blessed, tech-brother. Your diligence and the diligence of those like you turns anarchy into order, and bestows classification to Knowledge." {n}One of Pasqal's mechadendrites lightly touches the Lexmechanic's body. The Tech-Priest bows respectfully in return, clearly a little startled.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Bendito seas, tecnohermano. Tu diligencia y la de tus semejantes troncan la anarquía en orden, así como dotan de jerarquía al conocimiento». {n}Una de las mecadendritas de Pasqal roza el cuerpo del lexmecánico. A cambio, el tecnosacerdote, ligeramente sobresaltado, le dedica una reverencia.{/n}

languages.text: "Seid gesegnet, Tech-Bruder. Eure Sorgfalt und die anderer wie Ihr verwandelt Anarchie in Ordnung und Klassifizierung in Wissen." {n}Einer von Pasqals Mechadendriten berührt leicht den Körper des Lexmechanicus. Der Techpriester verbeugt sich daraufhin respektvoll, offensichtlich ein wenig erstaunt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Be blessed, tech-brother. Your diligence and the diligence of those like you turns anarchy into order, and bestows classification to Knowledge." {n}One of Pasqal's mechadendrites lightly touches the Lexmechanic's body. The Tech-Priest bows respectfully in return, clearly a little startled.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Seid gesegnet, Tech-Bruder. Eure Sorgfalt und die anderer wie Ihr verwandelt Anarchie in Ordnung und Klassifizierung in Wissen." {n}Einer von Pasqals Mechadendriten berührt leicht den Körper des Lexmechanicus. Der Techpriester verbeugt sich daraufhin respektvoll, offensichtlich ein wenig erstaunt.{/n}

languages.text: « Soyez béni, mon frère. Votre diligence et celle d'autres technoprêtres comme vous transforment l'anarchie en ordre et permettent de classifier la connaissance. » {n}L'une des mécadendrites de Pasqal touche légèrement le corps du lexmécanicien. Ce dernier s'incline avec respect, visiblement surpris.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Be blessed, tech-brother. Your diligence and the diligence of those like you turns anarchy into order, and bestows classification to Knowledge." {n}One of Pasqal's mechadendrites lightly touches the Lexmechanic's body. The Tech-Priest bows respectfully in return, clearly a little startled.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Soyez béni, mon frère. Votre diligence et celle d'autres technoprêtres comme vous transforment l'anarchie en ordre et permettent de classifier la connaissance. » {n}L'une des mécadendrites de Pasqal touche légèrement le corps du lexmécanicien. Ce dernier s'incline avec respect, visiblement surpris.{/n}

languages.text: "İmparator seni kutsasın tekno kardeşim. Kaos sen ve senin gibilerin gayretleri sayesinde düzene dönüşüyor; İrfan, sınıflandırmaya kavuşuyor." {n}Pasqal'ın mekadentritlerinden biri, Lexmekanik'in bedenine hafifçe dokunuyor. Bu harekete biraz şaşırdığı belli olan Tekno Rahip, karşılık olarak saygıyla eğiliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Be blessed, tech-brother. Your diligence and the diligence of those like you turns anarchy into order, and bestows classification to Knowledge." {n}One of Pasqal's mechadendrites lightly touches the Lexmechanic's body. The Tech-Priest bows respectfully in return, clearly a little startled.{/n}
